meanings.definition: A traditional Okinawan weapon consisting of two sticks connected by a chain or rope.
meanings.sent1: The ninja master demonstrated how to use the nunchaku with precision.
meanings.sent2: He practiced his nunchaku skills every day to improve his martial arts techniques.
meanings.sent3: During the training session, the nunchaku accidentally got tangled in the instructor's hair.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of the nunchaku hitting the air echoed through the dojo.
meanings.sent5: The nunchaku's swift movements were like a dance of danger in the skilled hands of the warrior.

meanings.definition: A pair of wooden or metal sticks used as a weapon in martial arts.
meanings.sent1: The martial artist carried his nunchaku in a protective case.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to wield the nunchaku effectively during her self-defense classes.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy thief tried to use the nunchaku but ended up hitting himself instead.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of battle, the nunchaku became an extension of the warrior's will.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nunchaku gleamed menacingly under the dojo's lights.
